inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where startofday(timestamp) > startofday(ago(1d))
| where cloud_RoleName in ("hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui")
| where name in ("GET /sign-in")
| summarize count() by user_Id, bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by timestamp desc , count_ desc 
| extend rn=row_number()
| project rn, user_Id, timestamp, count_

content.Query:
let startOfDay=startofday(ago(0d));
let pg=pageViews
    | where timestamp > startOfDay
    | where cloud_RoleName == "hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui"
    | where isnotempty(user_Id)
    | summarize arg_min(timestamp, *) by user_Id;
pg
| sort by timestamp asc 
| project user_id=row_number(), datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp, "Europe/London")
| render scatterchart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
pageViews
| where cloud_RoleName in ("hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui")
| where startofday(timestamp) == startofday(ago(0d))
| where isnotempty(user_Id)
| summarize pageViews=count() by username=hash_md5(user_Id)
| sort by pageViews desc
| take 100

content.Query:
pageViews
| where cloud_RoleName in ("hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui")
| where startofday(timestamp) == startofday(ago(0d))
| where isnotempty(user_Id)
| summarize pageViews=count() by user_Id
| sort by pageViews desc
| take 100
| project hash_username=hash_md5(user_Id), page_views=pageViews

inputs.name: Query
Query
Query
inputs.value:
let usg_events = dynamic(["*"]);
let mainTable = union pageViews
    | where timestamp > startofday(ago(0d))
    | where isempty(operation_SyntheticSource)
    | extend name =replace("\n", "", name)
    | extend name =replace("\r", "", name)
    | where '*' in (usg_events) or name in (usg_events)
    | where cloud_RoleName == "hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui";
let queryTable = mainTable;
let splitTable =  () {
    queryTable
    | extend dimension = column_ifexists('name', '')
    | extend dimension = iif(isempty(dimension), "<undefined>", dimension)
};
let cohortedTable = splitTable
    | where 'user_Id' != 'user_AuthenticatedId' or ('user_Id' == 'user_AuthenticatedId' and isnotempty(user_Id))
    | extend byDimension = bin(timestamp, 1h)
    | summarize metricHll = hll(user_Id) by byDimension, dimension;
let topSegments = cohortedTable
    | summarize mergedMetricHll = hll_merge(metricHll) by dimension
    | project dimension, dcount_user_Id = dcount_hll(mergedMetricHll)
    | top 5 by dcount_user_Id desc nulls last
    | summarize makelist(dimension);
cohortedTable
| extend dimension = iff(dimension in (topSegments), dimension, "Other")
| project byDimension, dimension, metricHll
| summarize metric = hll_merge(metricHll) by dimension, byDimension
| project byDimension, dimension, metric = dcount_hll(metric)
| render columnchart

content.Query:
let startOfDay=datetime_utc_to_local(startofday(ago(0d)), "Europe/London");
let mainTable = union pageViews
    | extend timestamp=datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp, "Europe/London")
    | where timestamp > startOfDay
    | where isempty(operation_SyntheticSource)
    | where cloud_RoleName == "hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui";
let queryTable = mainTable;
let splitTable =  () {
    queryTable
    | extend dimension = column_ifexists('name', '')
    | extend dimension = iif(isempty(dimension), "<undefined>", dimension)
};
let cohortedTable = splitTable
    | where 'user_Id' != 'user_AuthenticatedId' or ('user_Id' == 'user_AuthenticatedId' and isnotempty(user_Id))
    | extend byDimension = bin(timestamp, 15m)
    | summarize metricHll = hll(user_Id) by byDimension, dimension;
let topSegments = cohortedTable
    | summarize mergedMetricHll = hll_merge(metricHll) by dimension
    | project dimension, dcount_user_Id = dcount_hll(mergedMetricHll)
    | top 5 by dcount_user_Id desc nulls last
    | summarize makelist(dimension);
cohortedTable
| extend dimension = iff(dimension in (topSegments), dimension, "Other")
| project byDimension, dimension, metricHll
| summarize metric = hll_merge(metricHll) by dimension, byDimension
| project byDimension, dimension, metric = dcount_hll(metric)
| render columnchart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeGrain=5m;
let dataset=pageViews
    | where timestamp > startofday(ago(0d))
    | where client_Type == "Browser" 
    | where cloud_RoleName == "hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui";
let data = dataset
| order by duration desc 
| take 100;
data
| extend durationInSeconds = (duration / 1000)
| project operation_Name,  durationInSeconds, timestamp, performanceBucket

content.Query:
let timeGrain=5m;
let dataset=pageViews
    | where timestamp > startofday(ago(0d))
    | where client_Type == "Browser" 
    | where cloud_RoleName == "hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui";
let data = dataset
    | order by duration desc 
    | take 100;
data
| extend durationInSeconds = (duration / 1000)
| project
    operation_Name=operation_Name,
    duration_in_seconds=durationInSeconds,
    timestamp=format_datetime(datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp, "Europe/London"), 'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'),
    performance_bucket=performanceBucket

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let timeGrain=5m;
let dataset=pageViews
    | where timestamp > startofday(ago(0d))
    | where client_Type == "Browser" 
    | where cloud_RoleName == "hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui";
let data = dataset
| order by duration asc
| take 100;
data
| extend durationInSeconds = (duration / 1000)
| project operation_Name,  durationInSeconds, timestamp, performanceBucket

content.Query:
let timeGrain=5m;
let dataset=pageViews
    | where timestamp > startofday(ago(0d))
    | where client_Type == "Browser" 
    | where cloud_RoleName == "hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui";
let data = dataset
    | order by duration asc
    | take 100;
data
| extend durationInSeconds = (duration / 1000)
| project
    operation_name=operation_Name,
    duration_in_seconds=durationInSeconds,
    timestamp=format_datetime(datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp, "Europe/London"),'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'),
    performance_bucket=performanceBucket

inputs.name: Query
Query
Query
inputs.value:
let cutoff = startofday(ago(0d));
let ce=customEvents
| where cloud_RoleName in ("hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui")
| where timestamp >= cutoff
| extend type=name
| where type in ("Manage (opens in new tab)", "Log an outcome on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "Log an outcome (opens in new tab)", "Edit all other addresses on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "Change contact details on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "Change disability information on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "Change adjustments on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "View more in NDelius (opens in new tab)");
pageViews
| where cloud_RoleName in ("hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui")
| join kind=inner ce on operation_Id
| where timestamp >= cutoff
| summarize count() by name, type
| extend pageName=name, linkName=type
| project pageName, linkName, count_;

content.Query:
let cutoff = startofday(ago(0d));
let ce=customEvents
    | where cloud_RoleName in ("hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui")
    | where timestamp >= cutoff
    | extend type=name
    | where type in ("Manage (opens in new tab)", "Log an outcome on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "Log an outcome (opens in new tab)", "Edit all other addresses on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "Change contact details on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "Change disability information on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "Change adjustments on NDelius (opens in new tab)", "View more in NDelius (opens in new tab)");
pageViews
| where cloud_RoleName in ("hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui")
| join kind=inner ce on operation_Id
| where timestamp >= cutoff
| summarize count() by name, type
| extend pageName=name, linkName=type
| order by count_ desc 
| project pageName, linkName, count_;

inputs.name: Query

content.Query:
let timeGrain=5m;
let startOfDay=datetime_utc_to_local(startofday(ago(0d)), "Europe/London");
let dataset=pageViews
    | extend timestamp=datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp, "Europe/London")
    | where timestamp > startOfDay
    | where client_Type == "Browser" 
    | where cloud_RoleName == "hmpps-manage-people-on-probation-ui";
dataset
| summarize avg(duration / 1000) by bin(timestamp, timeGrain)
| extend pageView='Overall'
| render timechart

partHeader.title: average page loading duration in seconds
